mapper.select: /* 상품목록 */ SELECT m.id ,g.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,ccs.category_code_sub ,g.goods_resgister_time ,g.goods_image ,g.goods_price FROM goods AS g INNER JOIN member AS m ON m.id = g.id INNER JOIN company_category_sub AS ccs ON g.category_code_sub = ccs.category_code_sub;

/* 상품문의목록 */ SELECT goods_QnA_number as goodsQnaNumber ,goods_code as goodsCode ,id as GoodsInquiryId ,goods_QnA_datetime as goodsQnaDatetime ,goods_QnA_title as goodsQnaTitle ,goods_QnA_contents as goodsQnaContents ,goods_QnA_answer as goodsQnaAnswer ,goods_QnA_secret as goodsQnaSecret FROM goods_QnA;
